trends: There have been no other sightings in Dover, DE
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was in the early spring or fall of 1977 at the age of 11, I was camping with my brother and two friends in a field behind our home when a large object appeared over us at the tree top level approximately 75 ��� 100 feet above us. The object appeared out of nowhere and had No sound. From underneath, the object had Red lights in a U shape or boomerang shape. The lights were all connected, there was no seperation in the lighting. A brilliant beam of white light was shown down on us and I felt stunned or paralyzed, I could not run away. The light was extreamly bright and did not resemble a spot light from a helicopter. It was steady and and did not move around, it was directly on us. Time became distorted and I do not know how long the incident lasted. At some point it ended and we went to our tents disoriented and stunned. We all knew something strange had happened but it was as if we were unable to talk about it. To this day I do not know if this was a UFO or an experimental aircraft but I do know that what I saw was real.
Summary: Large UFO with Boomerang shaped Red Lights
